description.en-us: A central downtown locale and free Wi-Fi top the list of our guests' favorite features at the pet-friendly Knights Inn Salem. The two-story Knights Inn houses 42 rooms featuring coffeemakers hairdryers free local calls and flat-panel TVs. Wi-Fi is free property-wide. The hotel welcomes pets for a fee and parking is free. Less than four blocks east of Willamette University the Knights Inn is nestled in the heart of Salem. Guests are within a half-mile from the Oregon State Capitol building and just over one mile from Riverfront City Park situated on the banks of the Willamette River. Guests can head less than five miles south to tastings at the Honeywood Winery. Guests land at Portland International Airport less than 58 miles north of the hotel. The "affordable" rates "perfect location" and included free amenities like Wi-Fi and parking bring our guests to the Knights Inn Salem.

The Hotel offers a quiet, comfortable, clean and friendly service during your stay. The Howard Johnson Salem is within a mile from Downtown Salem and close to Willamette University, Salem General Hospital and State Fair Ground and Expo Center. Enjoy the Hotels Amenities such as the Complimentary Deluxe Continental Breakfast, Outdoor Heated Seasonal Pool, and Fitness Center. All Guest Rooms have Wireless High Speed Internet Access, Coffeemaker, Iron and Ironing Board, Hairdryer and In-Room Safes for 1.50 fee. Pets allowed, designated ground floor rooms only. Guests are required to register pet upon check-in and we reserve the right to refuse service or cancel reservation at our discretion. The NON SMOKING, Award Winning Howard Johnson Salem Oregon is conveniently located off all major freeways - I-5, Highway 22 and Highway 99.

subtitle.en-us: 3.5-star New York apartments in Midtown, walk to Radio City Music Hall

description.en-us:
Location
Located in Midtown, this apartment building is within a 10-minute walk of Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Center, and Broadway Theatre. Times Square is 0.4 mi (0.6 km) away. 49th St. Station and 47 - 50 Sts - Rockefeller Center Station are within a 5-minute walk.

Property Features
Along with a business center, this smoke-free apartment building has laundry facilities and a 24-hour front desk. WiFi in public areas is free. Additionally, express check-in, express check-out, and free newspapers are onsite.

Apartment Amenities
Each apartment provides a refrigerator and a microwave, plus free WiFi and cable TV. Additional amenities include a coffee/tea maker, free local calls, and a hair dryer.

Languages Spoken
English
